name: phonebook
description: Phonebook application for part3 of Fullstack open course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ~/fullstack-course/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ~/fullstack-course-part3/phonebook
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Samuel Leite
